contractDetails.multiyear: Temporality of the commitment (annual or pluriannual). Indicate if the contract covers more than one budget cycle.
contractDetails.numberOfMonths: Indicates the number of months and days covered by the contract if it is multi-year.
contractDetails.contractType: Name of the type of contract to be concluded.
contractDetails.priceScheme: Description of the payment conditions under which contracts may be agreed.

minValue.amount: Numerical number for the minimum amount established in the contract.
minValue.currency: Acronym of the type of currency in which the minimum value is expressed.

maxValue.amount: Numerical number for the maximum amount established in the contract.
maxValue.currency: Acronym of the type of currency in which the maximum value is expressed.

originalCurrencyValue.amount: Numerical code for the total amount of the contract in the type of currency with which you are subscribed.
originalCurrencyValue.currency: Acronym of the type of currency with which the contract is signed.
originalCurrencyValue.exchangeRate: Exchange rate, if foreign currency, which will be taken for conversion to national currency.

fiscalYearValue.amount: Numerical figure for the amount to be disbursed in the fiscal year.
fiscalYearValue.currency: Acronym of the type of currency in which the amount to be expended in the fiscal year is expressed.
